definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 请注意800赫兹以上的统一性。

sentences.english: Harmony is achieved through the sensitive balance of variety and unity.
sentences.chinese: 协调是通过多样性和统一性的微妙平衡实现的。

sentences.english: The unity of the Penal Code would also requires decriminalization of gambling.
sentences.chinese: 刑法的统一性也要求将赌博非犯罪化。

sentences.english: "This is the first consistent definition of blue jets and gigantic jets," says Pasko.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一次有关蓝色喷流和巨大喷流的统一性定义。

sentences.english: Theses colors, which are the authors unique latent language, are inter-related.
sentences.chinese: 这种统一性，使色彩成为作者独特的隐性话语。

sentences.english: How do you create and maintain unity in a social movement?
sentences.chinese: 如何在社会运动中创造和保持统一性？

sentences.english: This recognition set patristic Christianity on a collision course with classical politics.
sentences.chinese: 基督教将古代异教徒世界的统一性打得粉碎。

sentences.english: Christianity shattered the unity of the ancient, pagan world.
sentences.chinese: 基督教将古代异教徒世界的统一性打得粉碎。

sentences.english: I don't think this stanza detracts from the integrity of the poem.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这一节并没有损害全诗的统一性。

sentences.english: If you want this is the classical version of unitarity.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想这是经典版的统一性。

sentences.english: Promote uniformity in the development of conformance tests
sentences.chinese: 促进一致性测试开发中的统一性。

sentences.english: Hence enacted law is more authoritative and more integrative than judge-made law.
sentences.chinese: 因此，制定法比法官造法更具有权威性和统一性。
